system.description:
Starting at 3rd level, when you prepare your artificer spells you can prepare certain spells and create spell inventions for them in addition to your normal number of prepared spells. These spells count as artificer spells for you, even if they aren’t on the artificer spell list.

3rd Level @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z7r6plq6vyesck07]{Faerie Fire} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.43j7hjc2dqqlluoj]{Floating Disk}
5th Level @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z74pzb0a9lrha8qr]{Knock} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.0ah8d4swdpjvcu8m]{Rope Trick}
9th Level @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zc250942nlox9vyk]{Counterspell} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ef9fuzf8xcja2p7c]{Tongues}
13th Level @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pdvg7c9emjgnib07]{Confusion} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4rawhkoa81x8uqs0]{Resilient Sphere}
17th Level @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.f0lq2ogke9k8f1v9]{Mislead} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.lrkkwt5gwcocrvw8]{Passwall}
